entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
